mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER ORDER BY UNO DESC
SELECT interest, count(*) as count FROM MEMBER GROUP BY interest

SELECT TRUNC(avg(medicalCost)) as medicalCost, TRUNC(avg(foodCost)) as foodCost, TRUNC(avg(housingCost)) as housingCost, TRUNC(avg(culturalCost)) as culturalCost, TRUNC(avg(etc)) as etc FROM EXPENDITURE
